function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"BMI measurement using nurse-measured height and weight may lead to inaccurate results.","Impact":"Inaccurate BMI measurements may lead to incorrect categorization of individuals' weight status.","Mitigation":"Provide clear guidelines and training to nurses on accurate measurement techniques for BMI calculation.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Individuals undergoing BMI measurement","Owner":"Healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Anxiety and depressive symptoms measured using HADS-A and HADS-D scales may not capture the full extent of mental health issues.","Impact":"Incomplete assessment may lead to underdiagnosis of anxiety and depression in individuals.","Mitigation":"Supplement the HADS scales with additional mental health assessments to ensure comprehensive evaluation.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Individuals being assessed for anxiety and depression","Owner":"Mental healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Self-reported history of diabetes and CVD may result in underreporting or overreporting of the conditions.","Impact":"Misreported medical history may lead to incorrect treatment plans and interventions.","Mitigation":"Combine self-reported history with medical records and objective tests for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning.","Technologies":"Electronic health records, diagnostic tests","People":"Individuals reporting medical history","Owner":"Healthcare providers"}]}
